simple.name: carName
simple.description: name identifier of the car

simple.name: realCarLength
simple.description: length of car in m

simple.name: realCarWidth
simple.description: width of car in m (including odometer and side mirror)

simple.name: realCarHeight
simple.description: height of car in m (including height of velodyne)

simple.name: mass
simple.description: mass of car in kg (including sensors)

simple.name: torque
simple.description: max torque of the car

simple.name: frontShaftDistance
simple.description: distance from IMU to front shaft (front axle, Achse) in m

simple.name: rearShaftDistance
simple.description: distance from IMU to rear shaft (rear axle, Achse) in m

simple.name: medialAxisDistance
simple.description: distance from IMU to medial axis (Mittelachse) in m, negative=imu is to the right, positive=imu is to the left

simple.name: shaftDistance
simple.description: distance between front and rear shaft (Achse)

simple.name: frontDistance
simple.description: distance from front shaft to real front of car in m

simple.name: rearDistance
simple.description: distance from rear shaft to real back of car in m

simple.name: groundDistance
simple.description: distance of IMU to ground in m

simple.name: imuPitch
simple.description: pitch of IMU in radian

simple.name: tireDistance
simple.description: distance between left and right tire in m

simple.name: tireRadius
simple.description: radius of tire in m

simple.name: maxSpeed
simple.description: maximal safe speed for autonomous drive in m/s

simple.name: maxReverseSpeed
simple.description: maximal safe reverse speed for autonomous drive in m/s

simple.name: maxSpeedChange
simple.description: fastest possible acceleration in m/s/s

simple.name: maxBrakeChange
simple.description: fastest possible brake acceleration in m/s/s

simple.name: maxSteer
simple.description: in Rad

simple.name: maxSteerChange
simple.description: fastest possible steer change in radian/s

simple.name: maxSteerAngleAcceleration
simple.description: highest possible steer angle acceleration in radian/s/s

simple.name: turningCircleRadius
simple.description: radius of turning circle in m

simple.name: maxSteeringAngleInnerWheel
simple.description: in Rad

simple.name: maxSteeringAngleOuterWheel
simple.description: in Rad

simple.name: maxSteeringWheelAngle
simple.description: in Rad

simple.name: odometryTickLengthLeft
simple.description: in meter per tick

simple.name: odometryTickLengthRight
simple.description: in meter per tick
